attributes.action: Reverse the Decision of Mandatory Calorie Labels on Menus
attributes.additional_details:
I believe the decision to label calories will be incredibly damaging. Not only those struggling with eating disorders but also the general public - especially in a society so engrained in diet culture. 

From my point of view this will only cause more people to relapse & more eating disorders to be formed which will affect the already underfunded mental health services.

We should be striving for everyone to have a healthy relationship with food, not for everyone to become calorie obsessed.
attributes.background:
We would like the Government to rethink the decision of publishing calories on restaurant and takeaway menus.

Although well-intentioned, this has dangerous consequences that the Government are failing to see.
